channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Adobe Framemaker Publishing Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Adobe Framemaker Publishing Server

item.title: CVE-2024-20738|2024-03-15T16:32:10.311Z -- Adobe -- Adobe Framemaker Publishing Server
item.description: Adobe FrameMaker Publishing Server versions 2022.1 and earlier are affected by an Improper Authentication vulnerability that could result in a Security feature bypass. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to bypass authentication mechanisms and gain unauthorized access. Exploitation of this issue does not require user interaction.
